documentation.title: Control Structure Signatures
documentation.standard: Control Structures should have no spaces before opening parentheses and 1 space after closing parentheses. The opening brace should be preceded by one space and should be at the end of the line.

code.title: Valid: Correct spacing around the condition.
Invalid: Incorrect spacing around the condition.
Valid: Correct spacing around the loop.
Invalid: Incorrect spacing around the loop.
Valid: Correct placement of the opening brace.
Invalid: Incorrect placement of the opening brace on a new line.
